languages.text: "А по-моему ты просто грабишь его, воспользовавшись моментом. Если он призовет фон Валанциус на помощь — мы придем".
"If you ask me, you are simply using the situation to plunder his protectorate. Should he call upon House von Valancius for help, we will answer."
languages.original_text: "А по-моему ты просто грабишь его, воспользовавшись моментом. Если он призовет фон Валанциус на помощь — мы придем".

traits.locale_text: "If you ask me, you are simply using the situation to plunder his protectorate. Should he call upon House von Valancius for help, we shall answer."
"If you ask me, you are simply using the situation to plunder his protectorate. Should he call upon House von Valancius for help, we shall answer."
"If you ask me, you are simply using the situation to plunder his protectorate. Should he call upon House von Valancius for help, we shall answer."
"If you ask me, you are simply using the situation to plunder his protectorate. Should he call upon House von Valancius for help, we shall answer."
"If you ask me, you are simply using the situation to plunder his protectorate. Should he call upon House von Valancius for help, we will answer."
"If you ask me, you are simply using the situation to plunder his protectorate. Should he call upon House von Valancius for help, we will answer."

languages.text: “要我说的话，你不过是在借机掠夺他的王朝罢了。如果他向冯·瓦兰修斯家族求援，我们会帮他的。”
languages.original_text: "If you ask me, you are simply using the situation to plunder his protectorate. Should he call upon House von Valancius for help, we will answer."

traits.locale_text: “要我说的话，你不过是在借机掠夺他的王朝罢了。如果他向冯·瓦兰修斯家族求援，我们会帮他的。”

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}から見たら、お前はただ彼の保護領を略奪しているようにしか見えない。もし彼がフォン・ヴァランシウス家に助けを求めてきたら、応じるつもりだ」
languages.original_text: "If you ask me, you are simply using the situation to plunder his protectorate. Should he call upon House von Valancius for help, we will answer."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}から見たら、お前はただ彼の保護領を略奪しているようにしか見えない。もし彼がフォン・ヴァランシウス家に助けを求めてきたら、応じるつもりだ」

languages.text: «Yo creo que está aprovechándose de la situación para saquear su protectorado. Si pide ayuda a la casa von Valancius, se la daremos».
languages.original_text: "If you ask me, you are simply using the situation to plunder his protectorate. Should he call upon House von Valancius for help, we will answer."

traits.locale_text: «Yo creo que está aprovechándose de la situación para saquear su protectorado. Si pide ayuda a la casa von Valancius, se la daremos».

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr mich fragt, nutzt Ihr die Lage nur aus, um sein Protektorat zu plündern. Sollte er das Haus Valancius um Hilfe bitten, werden wir antworten."
languages.original_text: "If you ask me, you are simply using the situation to plunder his protectorate. Should he call upon House von Valancius for help, we will answer."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr mich fragt, nutzt Ihr die Lage nur aus, um sein Protektorat zu plündern. Sollte er das Haus Valancius um Hilfe bitten, werden wir antworten."

languages.text: « Si vous voulez mon avis, vous profitez de la situation pour piller son protectorat. S'il fait appel à la maison von Valancius, nous lui fournirons notre aide. »
languages.original_text: "If you ask me, you are simply using the situation to plunder his protectorate. Should he call upon House von Valancius for help, we will answer."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous voulez mon avis, vous profitez de la situation pour piller son protectorat. S'il fait appel à la maison von Valancius, nous lui fournirons notre aide. »

languages.text: "Bana sorarsan tek yaptığın, fırsattan istifade onun protektorasını yağmalamak. Eğer von Valancius Hanesi'nden yardım talep ederse bu talebine karşılık vereceğiz."
languages.original_text: "If you ask me, you are simply using the situation to plunder his protectorate. Should he call upon House von Valancius for help, we will answer."

traits.locale_text: "Bana sorarsan senin tek yaptığın, fırsattan istifade onun protektorasını yağmalamak. Eğer von Valancius Hanesi'nden yardım talep ederse, bu talebine karşılık vereceğiz."
